attributes.action:
Protect the UK & return illegal migrants to France before they get to
Britain
attributes.additional_details: We do not have any idea who these men are, whether they are infected with Covid-19, their identities, as they dispose of any evidence before they get to British waters or whether they are here to do us harm, which some are as proven historically. They are also a massive drain upon our already stretched resources, when quite obviously they have paid circa £5000 to make the crossing that they were not destitute! We are being made fools of by the french authorities who just want to offload them.
attributes.background: Use the Royal Navy to search for illegal crossings in the channel, rescue anyone breaking the law, check they are medically ok and return to France before they ever set foot on British soil.
